description: The audit trail for the lung allocation score of a patient.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LAS_AUDIT
columns.description: Stores the audit information for the lung allocation score for the transplant episode.

columns.name: LAS_DATE_AUDIT_DT
columns.description: Stores the audit trail information for the lung allocation score dates for the transplant episode.

columns.name: LAS_EXCEP_OTH_AUDIT
columns.description: Stores the audit trail information for the lung allocation score free-text exceptions for the transplant episode.

columns.name: LAS_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who made the corresponding update to the lung allocation score for the transplant episode.

columns.name: LAS_UPDATE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the corresponding change to lung allocation score was made for the transplant episode.

columns.name: LAS_CHANGE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of change that was made to the lung allocation score history.
